vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for plumbing pipe, fittings, fixtures, trims, and parts - Winston Water Cooler LTD in the estimated amount of $4,323,623.87, Core & Main LP in the estimated amount of $366,115.50, and Apple Specialist, Inc. in the estimated amount of $151,800.00, lowest responsible bidders of four - Total estimated amount of $4,841,539.37 Financing:  General Fund ($3,333,630.00), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($786,788.85), and Aviation Fund ($721,120.52)
